title: LogoType ID - Vectorisation
content:
I need to vectorize the Frans Bevers logo, seen here: [http://www.fransbevers.be/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825035259/http:/www.fransbevers.be/) (Above Left, "Catering Service Frans Bevers")

And I need to know the font of the text.  
So not the font in the yellow hexagon.

WhatTheFont was no help.

Thanks in advance!
author: Thorens
